definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: Research advances of nutrient requirement and metabolism of black porgy;
sentences.chinese: 研究了白蠟蟲營養需求與寄主植物營養含量關係。

sentences.english: Second, they live with a wax scale insect.
sentences.chinese: 其次，它們與白蠟蟲一起生活。

sentences.english: Damage and species of natural enemies of the White Wax Insect, Ericerus pela (Chavannes) were surveyed in Kunming of Yunnan Province.
sentences.chinese: 調查了昆明地區白蠟蟲天敵種類和優勢種的危害狀況。

sentences.english: Do they eat the wax produced by the scale?
sentences.chinese: 難道它們喫白蠟蟲產的蜂蠟？

sentences.english: Raising white wax insects is very profitable in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 放養白蠟蟲是農村非常有利的副業。
